archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Create Base Configuration
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Add basic information about the configuration, such as a description and version number.

properties.value: Create Base Configuration adds basic information about the configuration, such as a description and version number. When a new version of an existing configuration is created the Modify Entity Configuration is used to change the status of the previous version to indicate a new version has taken its place. A new version may represent the reconfiguration of an entity.
